name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Polygraf AI Content Detector: Advanced Plagiarism & ChatGPT Detector

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Free Polygraf AI content detector with plagiarism checker to identify ChatGPT, Gemini, Mistral, Llama, Grammarly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant content verification with the Polygraf AI Content Detector, now with exciting new features in our year-end update! This extension will help you to identify AI-generated text in real time and humanize, summarize your text directly within the tool. Whether you’re an editor, writer, student, marketeer, or just a curious browser, Polygraf AI Content Detector Chrome extension lets you check the authenticity of your digital content everywhere you work. Upgrade to use advanced features. 
We’ve introduced some major upgrades:
Fresh New Design: A sleek interface to make your workflow seamless.
Scan Anything, Anywhere: Highlight text and click our yellow Polygraf icon for instant detection—it's always right where you need it.
Text Editing Magic: Edit and scan text in one space, no more tab-hopping!


For Standard/Premium Plan Holders:
Instant Summaries: Get quick summaries for any text.
Humanizer (Beta): Transform AI-generated text into natural, human-like content, ensuring it's ready for any authenticity checks.


Polygraf remains the world’s most detailed AI Content Detector, capable of identifying content generated by ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Grammarly, and  with greater than 98% accuracy. It’s the only detector that can distinguish Grammarly-enhanced text from AI-generated content, providing unmatched accuracy for professionals and students alike.
Easy Installation:
Click ‘Add to Chrome’
Pin the Polygraf AI Detector to your extension bar
Log in using Google or Sign up with your email
Highlight text and click the extension icon to start detecting with our ChatGPT and Plagiarism checker.


Key Features:
AI Checker Free Version: Enjoy robust detection capabilities at no cost with the free version of our AI detector, including features like the ChatGPT detector and Grammarly detection with monthly renewing limited tokens.
AI Detection: Add Polygraf Google Chrome extension in seconds and use Polygraf AI Detection to identify Human or AI-generated content in real-time, including a precise ChatGPT detector for pinpointing AI-created text, and a plagiarism checker for identifying unoriginal content. Polygraf accurately shows ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Llama, and other gen-AI
AI Source Detection: Patent-pending Polygraf AI Content Detector will tell you whether the content was artificially generated, enhanced by Grammarly, or created by specific AI models like ChatGPT, functioning as an effective plagiarism detector as well.
Humanized Text Detection: Our extension can immediately tell you whether the content is original or has been altered by AI-powered humanizers, paraphrasers, or tools like Grammarly. 
Writing Style Analysis: Evaluates text on 6 parameters:
Perplexity: measures text complexity. (Higher tends to be Human)
Readability: indicates sentence structure complexity.
Vocabulary richness: reflects word diversity. (Higher tends to be AI, especially if altered by Grammarly)
Syntactic tree depth: assesses text predictability. (Higher tends to be AI)
Average sentence length: shows typical word count per sentence. (Higher tends to be AI)
Average word length: represents the average length of words used. (Higher tends to be AI)


Unmatched Accuracy: Boasts over 98% accuracy with a minimal false positive rate.
Versatile LLM Detection: Recognizes content generated by top AI models, including ChatGPT 3.5, 4; Google Gemini, Meta Llama 3, Mistral AI, Grammarly, and Claude.
Detailed Reports: Generates comprehensive reports to verify the originality of your content, leveraging both ChatGPT checker and plagiarism checker functionalities.
Deception Filter (Web interface only): Detects intentional and unintentional text modifications aimed at deceiving AI models, such as empty spaces between words, deliberate grammatical errors, or alterations by Grammarly.
Copyright Detector (Web interface only): Detects the original source of the content, providing URLs and exact sentence or phrase matches from the source, acting as a powerful plagiarism detector.


How It Works:
Polygraf AI uses proprietary AI protocols extensively trained on human and AI-generated content. Our real-time AI text detector can identify nuanced patterns in text to distinguish between human and AI authorship, even for Grammarly-enhanced text.
Real-time Detector: Verifies content origins in real-time across multiple models like ChatGPT, Google Gemini, Meta Llama 3, Mistral AI, Grammarly, and Claude.
Probability Assessment: Provides insights into the origin, trustworthiness, and whether content was human-written or AI-enhanced.
Forensic Linguistic Analysis: Traces machine-generated text back to its original source material.
Intuitive Interface: Features easy-to-use dashboards, direct source links, and clear similarity percentages.




Premium Features:
Unlock the full potential of Polygraf with a premium subscription:
Humanized Text Analysis: Detect if the content was humanized.
AI Source Detector: Identify which AI tool (e.g., ChatGPT) created the content.
Copyright Detector: Protect your work by identifying the original copyright holder.
AI Highlighter: See exactly which parts of your content are AI-generated.
Advanced Plagiarism Detector: Check for deeper plagiarism issues (web only).
Website AI Analysis: Instantly verify AI usage on websites.


Why Choose Polygraf?
The Best Detection Accuracy: Our AI Detector boasts an impressive >98% accuracy rate in internal tests, setting a benchmark in the industry. Polygraf is trusted by government agencies and businesses worldwide for its ChatGPT detector and plagiarism detector capabilities.
Unique Features: Did you know that Polygraf is the only AI detector that can tell if the content was enhanced by Grammarly or created by generative AI models like ChatGPT? This can be critical, protecting you against misinformation, propaganda, and claims of academic misconduct & copyright infringement with our advanced plagiarism checker.
Trust & Data Security: We don’t train our models on your data. This means we never store your information, making Polygraf a trusted, 100% secure AI Detector. Our ChatGPT detector, Grammarly detection, and plagiarism checker functionalities ensure your content remains original and credible.
By integrating a powerful ChatGPT detector, plagiarism detector, and Grammarly detection, Polygraf stands out as a comprehensive tool for anyone serious about maintaining the authenticity of their digital content.
